These self-adhesive, non-toxic vinyl stickers are waterproof, durable and will last for years without peeling, wrinkling or fading.

✓ The perfect addition to any indoor or outdoor room for both decoration and modern wall decal designs. Our inspiring quotes don't just brighten up the room, but brighten up the day. description: This motivating "Mom's Laundry Help Wanted" life quotes wall art decal is inspiring and the perfect touch for both indoor and outdoor decoration. It's a vinyl sticker that is easy to put on almost any smooth surface and really brings a room together adding the perfect touch of decoration. This entertaining vinyl decal quote brings humor to mother's domain. Our inspiring quotes don't just brighten up the room, but brighten up the day. All vinyl packages come with easy to follow instructions further explaining just how simple it is to apply vinyl on and off your surface of choice.
